welcome_message_body: Welcome to Karatepe, Turkey! This charming city is known for its rich history, beautiful landscapes, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Karatepe has to offer.

restaurants.name: Pekdemir Evimiz Keyif
restaurants.description: Pekdemir Evimiz Keyif is a café located in the city.
restaurants.address: Karamürsel Caddesi, Mahmutpaşa Mahallesi No:337, 41140 Kocaeli

restaurants.name: Paşa Sofrası
restaurants.description: Paşa Sofrası is a turkish restaurant located in the city.
restaurants.address: Ovacık mah. No:226 Yeni Hal Tesisleri Ust Kat No: 70 (Alsancak caddesi), Başiskele

restaurants.name: Bülbüloğlu Kahvalti
restaurants.description: Bülbüloğlu Kahvalti is a breakfast spot located in İzmit.

restaurants.name: Nizam Boşnak Börekçi
restaurants.description: Nizam Boşnak Börekçi is a turkish restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Acar Büfe
restaurants.description: Acar Büfe is a buffet located in the city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cengiz Topel Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Cengiz Topel Airport is used for transporting goods and freight.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network after completing a short registration process.
